president. Someone close to Mike Pence explains that "the people closest to him, the friends and people he knew best from Indiana, wanted to see him come back to Indiana." By contrast, the support for him to run nationally was in large part from leaders of the national conservative movement- who perhaps didn't have the same sway as his longtime supporters. Mike Pence 's young family- he has three school-aged children- were also a factor in his decision, according to this source.

It is the same faith and credit that enables us to borrow from rich people and from China and from other countries. As you well know, in the history of this country, the United States has never defaulted on one penny owed to a creditor. Providing Vermont and other states with the flexibility to build upon health care reform will result in better care and greater access at a lower cost. Allowing us to become a laboratory for innovation and excellence will help Vermonters, while once again allowing us to lead the way. Patrick Leahy said, "While some in Washington are trying to turn the clock back on health reform, Vermont instead is moving forward.
